text: Giorgos Gerapetritis (born 26 June 1967) is a Greek politician, professor and lawyer. He has been the Minister for Foreign Affairs of the Hellenic Republic since June 2023. Before, he was Minister of State from 2019 to 2023 and Minister of Infrastructure and Transport from March to May 2023. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Greek lawyers Category:Foreign ministers of Greece
title: Giorgos Gerapetritis
